mapper.insert: insert into mainadmin(mainadmin_name, password, password_mainadmin,email, created_at) VALUES(#{mainadminName}, #{password},#{passwordMainadmin},#{email}, NOW())
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM mainadmin WHERE mainadmin_name =#{mainadminName} AND password=#{password} AND password_mainadmin = #{passwordMainadmin}
SELECT row_number() over(order BY id )as NO , am.id , am.admin_name , am.email FROM mainadmin mm INNER JOIN admin am ON mm.id = #{adminId}
